room_title: Escape room "The Phantom Soldier" by Square Room Escape in Los Angeles
review: Phantom Soldier was awesome! Challenging but fair. The room is super decked out compared to other ones I've tried.

room_title: Escape room "The Phantom Soldier" by Square Room Escape in Los Angeles
review: The decoration is on point. Staffs are nice. Puzzles are challenging.

room_title: Escape room "The Phantom Soldier" by Square Room Escape in Los Angeles
review: This is a great way to have fun with a group of friends! I'm not someone who typically enjoys puzzles, riddles, games, etc., but Square Room Escape has really elevated the experience for me. This is an excellent alternative for when you're looking for something to do and want a different option than going to the movies/bowling/karaoke. The clues are never the same, the rooms are beautifully decorated, and the whole thing from start to finish is very immersive. Definitely go check it out!
